blocks.content: Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Understood the value of proactive alerting over passive dashboard monitoring
- Planned effective alert rules with appropriate thresholds and urgency
- Used Grafana's Drilldown apps to discover metrics and logs to alert on
- Created an alert rule from scratch using the query builder
- Configured conditions, evaluation intervals, and pending periods
- Organized alerts with labels and annotations
- Saved, activated, and monitored your alert rule
You now have a working alert rule that actively monitors your infrastructure and notifies you when issues arise. This is the foundation of proactive operationsâ€”your data now watches itself.
